Notice

The government orders that the Commanders of Brigades, Corps, and Squadrons, as soon as they receive this, immediately forward, through the proper channels, to the Most Excellent

The government also recommends that the Commanders of Divisions, Brigades, etc., through whom these reports must pass, mention the officers of orders who are not assigned or attached to any of the units. The government expects from said Commanders a scrupulous examination and great circumspection regarding this requirement.

Secretary of State of the War Affairs in Piratini, August 31, 1837. In the absence of the Most Excellent Sir Domingos José de Almeida. (a) Antônio Vicente de Siqueira Pereira Leitão.

Most Illustrious Sir Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Center Column. Wherever you may be. From the Ministry of the Interior, Treasury, and War.
